Baby Care Simulator is a fun interactive game where you take care of a virtual baby. Monitor their needs, keep them fed, entertained, and happy!

**Features:**

- Track baby's hunger, happiness, and energy levels
- Interactive care actions (feed, play, rest)
- Visual feedback and animations
- Simple, intuitive interface
